title: Filthy King
description: I'm nothing like my father.My brothers don't realize I'm a thousand times worse.Grief fuels my every action.Vengeance burns through my veins, dictating every decision I make.I'll shatter allegiances to please him.I'm nothing like my father.You don't realize that I'm a thousand times worse.I have Savannah at my side—a ruthless partner capable of raining hellfire upon her enemies—until she realizes I lied to her...My house of cards is tumbling down, and I've underestimated my Queen.FILTHY KING is the seventh book in the Five Points' Mob Collection, and can be read as a standalone.Contains a series cliffhanger.
author: Serena Akeroyd
